content: Well known image uploading site: https://imgbb.com/Image uploading site created by one of the Bitcointalk members: https://www.talkimg.com/For Nigerians (and other people) that are using imgur for uploading images on Bitcointalk, it is no longer working. Not only that, also that most of the images that we have uploaded before are no more showing. To solve that, read the posts on this thread:[Script] Imgur to TalkImg - automatically fix your broken imagesRunning a code like this on your browser can make a hacker to take over your computer, but it is from a trusted member on this forum no complain from other forum users and I believe it is legit.Image uploading site, https://www.talkimg.com/ was created by one of our forum users, joker_josue. You can read about it on this thread: TalkImg.com - Image hosting for BitcoinTalk.Uploading images on https://www.talkimg.com/ is easy. Even works when using Tor or Orbot.Another way that you can get your images from Imgur: [get yours] Images from imgur

comments.author: Charles-Tim
comments.body: Important notice: Quote from: TryNinja on May 15, 2023, 09:56:26 AMSince there is a risk (?) of imgur deleting images today, I decided to add ImgBB as a image provider while TalkImg is under maintenance.Just change the field "provider" at the top to "imgbb" (IMPORTANT: ALL LOWERCASE) and add your account's API key just a few lines below (providers -> imgbb -> apiKey).Example:Code:const provider = 'imgbb'Code:imgbb: {    url: 'https://api.imgbb.com/1/upload',    apiKey: 'YOUR-API-KEY',    uploadsPerMinute: 10,    deleteOnError: false,}Run the script and the images will be uploaded to imgbb + your posts updated.The script is now published (and will be updated) here: https://gist.github.com/ninjastic/36c14fb2eb1c4b750f40f332d408688fI think this is visible enough to all we Nigerians.
